name: JORDAN ENGLISH
bio: I'm the manager of 7.SUNS and chief of New Brave World. I live for impact & fun -lots of it. #🤍🤍🤍

social_posts.post_text:
TAKE THEM.

Your life is your life. Don’t let it be clubbed into dank submission. Be on the watch. There are ways out. There is light somewhere. It may not be much light but it sure beats the _________.

The gods will offer you chances. Know them. Take them. You can’t beat death, but you can beat death in life.

Sometimes. And the more often you learn to do it, the more light there will be. Your life is your life. Know it while you have it. You are marvelous, the gods wait to delight in you. 

—
#🤍🤍🤍 #thelaughingheart #charlesbukowski #newbraveworld

RED SKY. 

In mere seconds we can glide into the atmosphere - but sailors still learn from the same signs the Universe has provided for 2023 years.

“Red sky at night, sailors delight. Red sky in the morning… get ready mofo… this is going to be a ________ …”

It’s stunning to embrace the beauty of a world who reinvents it’s ecosystems and entire atmosphere - not only in every day, week, month, and circle of the sun - but in measures beyond our - simplicity.
__
#🤍🤍🤍 #newbraveworld

UNTITLED THREE.

Strength is overcome by weakness. Joy is overcome by pain. The night is overcome by brightness and love - it remains the same.

#🤍🤍🤍 #tupacshakur #newbraveworld

DÍA de MUERTOS.

Just before midnight on Día de Muertos, my little man sailed into what comes next. After nearly two decades of incredible journey, it’s impossible to say where he started and I began. 

He loved running into the waves of the Pacific, and he loved it even more when he discover the warmth of the Atlantic.

Diesel could navigate his way from Wall Street to the Ramble, he was picky with reason - demanding the best because he was the absolute best - then, now… and forever.

A CLEAR HORIZON.

“A clear horizon — nothing to worry about on your plate, only things that are creative and not destructive… I can’t bear quarreling, I can’t bear feelings between people — I think hatred is wasted energy, and it’s all non-productive. 

I know we’re only human, we do go in for these various emotions, call them negative emotions, but when all these are removed and you can look forward and the road is clear ahead, and now you’re going to create something — I think that’s as happy as I’ll ever want to be.”

#AlfredHitchcock #CreatorsEconmy #7SUNS #newbraveworld

HELLO, WORLD!

In 1978, two of our lifetimes most influential creators, Dennis Ritchie and Brian Kernighan, collaborated to introduce a groundbreaking concept that would echo through the realms of programming for decades to come. Their bravery wasn't just about lines of code; it was a pioneering step towards a new understanding of intelligence itself.

Their creation, the C programming language, marked a pivotal moment in the history of computing, solidifying the iconic "Hello, World!" as the inaugural phrase within lines of code. The building blocks of my career and life — and likely yours as well. 

As they embarked on their journey to define C programming, Ritchie and Kernighan authored the influential book "The C Programming Language." This literary masterpiece not only illuminated the syntax and intricacies of C but also featured the very first example program: "Hello, World!" It was this simple yet profound act that laid the cornerstone for a tradition embraced by programmers in every country around our shared globe. 

Beyond its modest introduction, the C programming language became the building blocks for an entire spectrum of computer languages and systems. They inspired not only the first and second, but now third life of the web, and what I see as the birth of a new civilization.

While "Hello, World!" may have begun as a humble greeting that compelled us to code, it transformed into a symbol of programming education, a testament to the brilliant minds of Ritchie and Kernighan, and a catalyst for the power of digital transformation. 

Their journey as creators paved the way for the intricate landscapes of modern life, including the dynamic realm of artificial intelligence—a force that continues to reshape our world in ways once thought fanciful.

They did this in 1978. The computer in your pocket has more power than all of the computers they could access combined. AI not only brings us closer to people and the planet, but closer to a human condition that reflects the power of creation itself; in every measure of time and space, and in ways our primitive minds have only begun to understand. 

#7SUNS #newbraveworld #creatorsjourney #venturecapital

364 DAYS.

It’s been a year since I captured this moment in the Pacific during my favorite ten minutes of the day, just as many suns vanished and our greatest revealed the horizon. The navy water has observed the birth of generations, the rise and fall of civilizations, and the boundless potential of everything new.

Amidst the chaotic currents, there exist steady anchors that ground intelligence – elements that are understood and novel. Just as the tides faithfully follow the energetic pull of nature, we too are paced by the cycle. 

I love this moment because it stands still, revealing the unwavering rhythm of excellence, bridging the gap between what is known and the ideas awaiting, a place where dreams find their rest, a new day discovers its light, and we’re trusted to do the thing we were born to do all over again; very slowly and all at once, individually and together — we create. 

#7SUNS #newbraveworld #creatorseconomy #venturecapital #carlsbad #california #pacific #ocean #dawn

CONCENSUS. 

Within the tapestry of our ideas lies an interplay, woven by the spectrum of our brightest and darkest motivation. As we navigate the archetypal landscape of our narrative, a revelation concedes: harmonizing our heroism with every shade as we ascend towards true talent. 

A mere 17 months have elapsed since the inception of New Brave World’s AI —an endeavor to automate the creator's journey. And for me, the mission embarked with a plunge into the core of my own.

The global landscape is being gamified as the reflection we once shared with technology is reversed. As I explored this idea, I found myself entranced by the teachings of Jung, the vision of Galileo, and the East. I went deep. The mixture is a contrast from a midwestern son of a pastor and provides insight into the intricate dance between the hero and villain we play individually and collectively as - we create. 

Our path as creators unfurls in multitudinous narratives, akin to the vibrant tapestry of an MMO—a Massive Multiplayer Online Game. Just as Jung and Galileo journeyed as kindred spirits, their paths divergent yet convergent, they illuminated the truth that we stand as both protagonist and antagonist in our own journey as creators. The spark of creative brilliance ignites when we embrace fluidity, the adaptability needed to dive into diverse terrains with a singular vision. From their wisdom to Newton’s, I've remixed my own maxim: "No giant in this lifetime, or any to come, has shoulders more powerful than our own." 

Jung's "shadow" beckons us to embrace the dark —the hidden. With the embrace, we learn that darkness isn't the absence of light; it's the understanding —an idea essential to the excellence we strive to mirror. Galileo, in his own quest for zenith, speaks to us from the realm of reason, his journey and roadmap for prevailing amidst resistance, even when it required embracing odds with convention.

As with all intelligence, when you overlap two ideas with a third, you can see the universe compels us to create with nothing less than truth. And from here the game starts to become truly amazing.

#7SUNS #newbraveworld #creatorsjourney #thegame

THE GAME.

Shakespeare, Jobs, Musk, and Tarantino each allowed their masterpieces to emerge as a symphony of deliberate iteration, unfolding gradually like acts in a play—scenes on a stage, and stories woven one thread at a time. As their accomplishments unfurled, so too did the realization that the path to excellence is paved with meticulous dedication, echoing the tenets of circular economies they championed.

As the global workforce evolves, your Lifetime Value, or what gaming studios and iconic brands refer to as (LTV), will be a direct reflection of the people you collaborate with, places you go, life you experience, and diverse currency you create. 

How incredible to visualize this alongside Droit de suite or the Moral Creative rights that France introduced in 1920. Droit de suite, literally translates as “The right to follow,” ensures that all creators enjoy the benefits of their contributions throughout their current journey and into the future.

My creative partner Johnny and I worked on a story bible throughout the summer—the same kind of document that allows the world's best MMOs or Massive Multiplayer Online Games to come to life, and it starts with a few rules for the road; 1: Play with space but not time. 2: Respect everyone but only partner with the best. 3: Choose your tools wisely and learn how to use them faster and better every day. 4: Cash will always be King but the Kings of tomorrow are not like the Kings of today.

The dots from the future have connected and the music and voice of the creators economy is all around us. If your not creating today then I hope you are by tomorrow, stay focused and expect the best and remember things come together very slowly and then all at once, as individually and together - we create.

#7SUNS #newbraveworld #creatorseconomy #creatorsjourney #thegame

SCOPELY.

It's been nearly ten years since Libby, Michael, Johny, Margrete, Christopher, Reed, Andy, Lauren, Simon, Keith, Eric, and many more, set the stage for a groundbreaking chapter in Scopely's history—the recent $4.9 billion acquisition by Savy Games.

Beyond the staggering financial accomplishment, the true essence lies in the creative power that not only propelled Scopely's triumphant journey but the talent who also catalyzed the rise of numerous pioneering and iconic brands across sports, entertainment, healthcare, wellness, technology, and gaming landscapes.

A pivotal force in shaping my own unwavering mission was Scopely's influence in tandem with the inception of New Brave World and the birth of 7.SUNS.

Achievement acts as a catalyst for success, intelligence serves talent, and, as always, it's the bonds of friendship and fusion of collaborative efforts that yield true value.

A heartfelt admiration to Javier for adeptly steering this extraordinary success, coupled with the countless contributors who have been pivotal in crafting this roadmap —one that is poised to steadfastly uphold its position amung the top M&A transactions of 2023.

This is not just a story of business; it's a testament to the creators journey, and the relentless pursuit of excellence, and the new oceans that continue to reveal, as individually and together - we create.

#🤍🤍🤍 #creatorsjourney #creatorsecomomy
I'm the manager of 7.SUNS and chief of New Brave World. I live for impact & fun -lots of it. #🤍🤍🤍
